Html:
I would like to be able to problematically empty the tile cache when using a GMap control in ServerAndChache mode. 

Is there a specific method I can use on a GMapControl to empty the tile cache for that control? I am using the WinForms version of GMap.NET

Thanks.

Thanks, I appreciate the help. However, map.Manager does not seem to have a PrimaryCache property. I am using v1.6 WinForms. Is this feature present in this version?

 

The properties of map.Manager I see are:

 

CacheOnIdleRead

CancelTileCaching

DeserializeGPX

DisableCodePlexAnalyticsPing

Equals

ExportGPX

ExportToGMDB

GetHasCode

GetImageFrom

GetType

ImageCacheLocal

ImageCacheSecond

ImportFromGMDB

IsRunningONMono

MemoryCachecapacity

MemoryCacehSize

Mode

OptimizeMapDb

SerializeGPX

ShuffleTilesONLoad

SQLitePing

ToString

UseDirectionsCache

UseGeocoderCache

UseMemoryCache

UsePlacemarkCache

UserRouteCache
i think in the old version there is no such function
Ok, cool. I am using 1.6 (power) from the download on the main page. Which version would you recommend using that is the most stable and has this function?
